publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4967 Mrs Nanette Milne: Congratulations to United Auctions Livestock Mart, Huntly—That the Parliament congratulates United Auctions livestock mart at Huntly on the recent extension and development of improved customer and staff facilities at the mart, including a 100-seat cafe; notes that the mart attracts buyers and sellers from across the north east of Scotland, as well as a growing number from the Black Isle and Caithness, and further notes that this investment is a welcome step forward with the potential to further develop the farming industry in the north east and provide farmers with a local choice for buying and selling livestock. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Dave Petrie*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Brian Adam*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Alex Fergusson*, Bill Aitken*, Shiona Baird*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-4967 Congratulations to United Auctions Livestock Mart, Huntly (lodged on 18 October 2006) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4967 Congratulations to United Auctions Livestock Mart, Huntly (lodged on 18 October 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-4967 Congratulations to United Auctions Livestock Mart, Huntly (lodged on 18 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
